name: Luminus (Demo)
description:
After a horrible accident, Benjamin’s only company is his battered teddy bear. Together, you must find your way to safety, while solving puzzles and evading those that hide in the dark. Find ways to repair your bear to unlock its full potential, and discover new ways it can help you on your journey.

SOLVE PUZZLES

Find ways to clear the path for yourself and Mr. Bear

EVADE THE DANGERS OF THE DARK

Get your timing right and be quick to make it out alive

UPGRADE YOUR TEDDY BEAR

Find upgrades in the world to upgrade Mr. Bear and discover its new skills

HUG!

Give your bear some powerful hugs to find comfort in the dark

INTERACT WITH THE WORLD

And discover clues to a tragic story
